subject: [Phase 3] Slim skill descriptions and extract to references
description:
Step 3a: Slim frontmatter descriptions for ALL skills (user + local-marketplace):
- gemini-cli: 8 bullets + 8 examples (~1.1k tokens) → 1-2 lines
- llm-billing: 3 lines + 3 examples → 1 line
- fast-cli: Long trigger list → slim
- All local-marketplace skills: audit each, 1-2 lines max

Target pattern: `description: One-line summary. When to use it.`

Step 3b: For skills with >50 lines in SKILL.md body without references, extract heavy content to references/:
- gemini-cli: move examples to references/examples.md, prompt templates to references/prompt-construction.md
- Apply to ALL skills that need it
